review:
The best doctor for my wife during pregnancy, she was very clear on do's and don'ts for my wife and explains the reason behind the symptoms she has during pregnancy.

Rarely she prescribes any medicine other than for Calcium and Iron which is essential during pregnancy.

Very patient doctor especially when you have lots of doubts and also if you want to clarify myths coming from your ancestors (For Eg. We had a doubt if we can consume saffron during pregnancy to have a fair baby, doctor said if you like the taste, go ahead else it doesn't make any difference. To be on a safer side, I didn't allowed my wife to consume the saffron, and we are now blessed with a fair baby)

The delivery was normal only because of the this Doctor, we all gave up because my wife could not bear the pain, but till last minute doctor was keeping us motivated by saying that my wife is progressing well and can deliver baby soon. Though it was a tough time during the labor pain, all the pain did not go in vain and finally my wife delivered a baby with a normal procedure.

****** *** ** *** ****  **** ****** ** ***** **** * *** *** ** **** **** ***********. She is like a God's messenger to help the needy. My wife successfully delivered a healthy baby, despite having multiple fibroids. (whereas few major Pvt. hospitals in Bangalore had suggested removal of uterus in such a case). *** *** ****** *** ******* ** ** ***** I shall remain thankful to her all my life. Surely I will meet & thank her personally.
 I have seen her at St. John's Gyne Dept.-working & attending to patients tirelessly (in morning & late evening hrs as well). He lovely nature & command over various languages makes the patients feel in safe hands. No doubts her calibre & rich experience to handle different gyne ailments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Annamma Thomas, she is like an angel who saved me and my son. I was diagnosed with para ovarian cyst torsion during pregnancy. 
One of my cousins suggested here and I underwent cystectomy and laporotamy during 7 th month of my pregnancy. Luckily baby and I were safe. 
And I delivered a healthy baby boy at 37 weeks.
Annama Thomas, is such a friendly and cheerful doctor, she made me feel so good and I recovered fast.
I would like to suggest her to all pregnant women. 
I am very grateful to her üôèüòä

I had a horrible Experience with this Dr annamma. I had consulted around 6 times during my first trimester at her Fundus clinic koramangala .I had complained about the stomach pain she gave some gastric medicine.Again we went and informed like looks like not stomach ache she was like everything is fine. And she changed the medicine for some days was fine. In the     4th month again i got severe stomach cramps, literally i was shedding tears when i spoke to her over phone her reaction was so pathetic.the way she talks i didn't know who u r. we ran in to   st johns hospital we waited for Dr Annamaa an hr because she was my consulted Dr,staff over there informed her but she didn't even come by the time miscarriage was happened, the very next day she came in to the room for rounds her response was so silly. i don't know the reason this may happen no guarantee for this case and all. and she walked out from the room.
so i would like to request all the ladies who r gonna give birth to little ones please don't trust her.If u want ur baby alive plus consult some other good gynecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Absolute an awful experience. Spent the entire pregnancy under her but thankfully not delivery. *** ****** ******* **** *** ***** ********* *** ************ **** *** **. She **** ******* ********* ******* shouts at patients (and even junior doctors/nurses while you are admitted under her, which makes the situation very uncomfortable and next in the line is your turn to get shouted at). She deals with cash only and gets very angry if asked for a bill. Being a Govt officer, only I know how I resisted myself from reporting her strictly cash transactions without bill. *** **** ****** *** *** *** ******* ** ***** ***** ******* *** ******* **** ********** *** ****** **************** ******** *** *** *** *** ******* **** **** ********** ***** ****** *** *** **** *** ** ** *****. Please go and sit outside Fundus clinic one evening and see the situation yourself. *** **** **** **** *** **** **** **** ** **** ****** **** **** ** ***** **** ******* *** ******* ** ****** *** *********. She even tried to lecture me ** *** ********* ***** and tried to even scold my mother *** *** ********** ********* ***** ** **. Overall it was horrendous. Somehow I was too reluctant to change the doctor during my pregnancy but eventually, I did at the last moment. **** ** **** *** **** **** ***** ** ********* *******. ****** *** **** ********* ****** *** **** ** ******* ** *** ******* **** ** ******** **** ******* **** ****** ***** **** **** ***** **** ********* *** ******* ** ************* ******* there is NO reason to not go to doctors *** **** *** ***** *********.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Initially I was under the assumption that the doctor is very senior, so she would treat me really well. But she proved it wrong by her disrespectful behavior, not allowing husband to enter with the patient, disrespecting my mother *** *** ********** ** ****** ********** ** ****** ******* *******. ** ****** *** **** **** ********** **** ***.I gave her respect only because of the "Dr." prefix in her name. But she is impatient to hear our problems or queries, ******** **** ** **** *** * **** ******* although we pay n wait for hours to meet her. she wants to finish consultation in 5 mins.* *** ************  *** ** ** *** ** *** **** *** *** ******* ******** ********* ** ******** ********* ** ** ******** *** **** ***** ** ********** *********** ** ****** *** ***** ******* ******** *** *** **** ***** **** **** ******** ***** *** **** ** ***** *** *** **** ** ******** *** **** *** ************** *******

******* ****** ** *** **** ***** **** **** ******** I consulted her for my pregnancy. She kept the medicines minimal and suggested me to eat healthy food instead. She made me feel positive throughout my pregnancy journey. Mine was a normal delivery and baby was healthy, though I had complications at third Trimester. My son is now 2 years old and I still feel so grateful to my doctor. Very happy to write a review about her. She is strict at times but all for the good of her patients.. And highly ethical to her profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very warm and service minded. Due to her tremendous popularity, she has experience with all kinds of issues/complications. She is patient with all and takes as much time as necessary to answer all questions. I had visited her first time almost 13 years ago as a teenager due to irregular periods. After doing all tests she assured me I have no issue and sure enough, I didn't have any issue with conception after marriage even though my periods are very irregular. She is truly an expert and is flexible to get our lab tests done at any clinic. Usually doctors will have tie ups with certain clinics but not dear Dr Annamma. We also met another couple who said she didn't charge them beyond the first consultation (they we're in their second trimester we met them). Very dedicated and expert doctor. Don't bother about the negative reviews- they are very biased for sure.

context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
The moment i met her for the first time i heard an inner voice that i can trust her and now i m in safe hand .She dealt my case with patience and provided me satisfactory treatment. My experience in St.Johns labour room was not good some how i found staff was bit harsh and for a moment i was loosing hope but though it was emergency C section but she handled it on time carefully and gave me the biggest happiness of my life my son.
I thank her for every suggestion, every effort and everything she did for me and truly recommend her *** ** *** ** *** **** **************

context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
The moment i met her for the first time i heard an inner voice that i can trust her and now i m in safe hand .She dealt my case with patience and provided me satisfactory treatment. My experience in St.Johns labour room was not good some how i found staff was bit harsh and for a moment i was loosing hope but though it was emergency C section but she handled it on time carefully and gave me the biggest happiness of my life my son.
I thank her for every suggestion, every effort and everything she did for me and truly recommend her *** ** *** ** *** **** **************

I am not a person who writes reviews. However I had no choice but to find the time and make an effort  to publicly acclaim the Angel in  SAINT Dr Annamma.  I had to wait an hour to see her. But I had no choice for there were other patients who had tokens before me, and come from various parts of the country.  Others waited as well. However every patient who came out of her chamber after the consultation, seemed to be radiating with satisfaction, joy and blessed. No one thought their wait was in vain.  While waiting I spoke to others who were waiting and asked  them why they were coming here inspite of the wait. The unanimous answer was that this doctor is more sympathetic and understanding than any other person or doctor. Several patients had come for second opinion including myself. Dr Annamma was very upfront and clearly indicated that her choice of delivery will always be a normal delivery. After my consultations I never minded the wait as I had found an Angel, whose tender loving hands mixed with love and sympathy, I had never seen  or experienced before.  For me, my family and friends there cannot be another doctor for Obstetrics and Gynaecology.  Thank You Maam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Me and my wife are very much happy by the consultation of Annama Thomas.We consulted her for pregnancy chechkup.She doesnt prescribe uncessary medication or scannings.She is too friendly and manages each patient nicely**** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ********* *** i would highly recommend her to all.Thankyou Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Annama Thomas is a very caring doctor. She advice's the right treatment with minimal cost. She is very patient to listen to your concerns. As much as we want to have children, she also wishes the same and treats accordingly. I would certainly refer Dr. Annama Thomas to anyone who would like take her expert services for pregnancy.

Thanks Again Dr. Annama Thomas

We were visiting Dr for my wife's pregnancy on a regular basis until the delivery, Doctor is very friendly and soft spoken. Gives very clear advice about the check up, current situation and further precautions if any. We are very much satisfied and recommend 100% regarding gynic issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been visiting Dr.Annama Thomas for the last 4-5 months. she has been guiding us, providing the right medicines, and avoiding typical pitfalls, as this is our first. she is very approachable, patient and answers all queries, until you are satisfied. The experience shows, and her approach is very different. ** ** ******** *** **** ************* ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hi I am roopa Navaneeth good and well experienced doctor, I had visited for my 1st pregnancy, I remember at my delivery time I was demanding for c section but the she came and spoke me and put her had on my head and said I am there, I got tears in my eyes, she successfully did normal delivery, now my son is 3 year old and I am going to visit her for my 2nd baby. all I say Dr.Annamma thomas is great.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******* ****** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ********** I have been visiting her for me wife's pregnancy. She listens our query with patience. She diagnose the issue very nicely and do the right treatment. I have referred so many people to her and all of them are happy.

I visited the doctor in St.Johns Medical hospital waited for almost 3 hours to see her and the experience that she gave was horrendous.Her consultation lasted for barely 1 minute.She did not listen to me patiently or address my concerns just prescribed one medicine and finished the consultation. I have never seen a doctor like her. You need to understand each patient is important and they come to you with some hope. If you have 80 patients you need to see them with equal concern.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** **** *** **** ******* ** *** I haven't seen such a wonderful doctor and human being ever. She is extremely talented and most dedicated person.i had lot of complications in my pregnancy if not for her I would have lot of trouble. *** ****** ***** I would recommend her to all the ladies with gync issues. She is very friendly and explains everything in detail.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: First time in my life, I came across a doctor who spent time in explaining everything so details to the patients. Dr.Annamma is a real image of the divine healer. God is working through An Amma doctor and she is a blessing to everyone one who consult her. God bless you doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I have very bad experience ,I saw the review on practo,as it was very good ,so I changed my doctor to Annama Thomas ,as it's 8 months + ,after continuing 2 to 3 visits(every 15 days) suddenly wife got itching severely ,though I informed her,she said it's normal nothing to worry ,after 9 months  my wife got false pain, So I immediately went  to ** ****** hospital for check up ,but there I have to wait for nearly 2 +hr as doctor behave me like new patient ,and filled up all the form first ,then she told me it's already 6 pm ,you admit her I ll come tommorrow and do the check up ,it's hurt me a lot , immediately I changed my old doctor ,and for itching she prescribed medicine also do some blood test ,as report is not normal,I have to go for c-section ,many many thanks to God I changed the doctor ,my opinion is as long as you are going to her clinic she is very polite ,but in hospital she is totally opposite .

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: We consulted her last week, she just wasted one full day just to tell us to do a scanning, she is least bothered about the patients and very rude, we visited the hospital at 11 am and waited till 6pm at the hospital and we calmly requested her to see the scanning report as we were getting late to our office but she was very arrogant and asked us to wait again to see the report. She was busy in attending the special consultants *** **** **** *** she don't even care about the people who are waiting outside. *** ** *** ****** ****** * **** **** **** ** ** ***** ****** **** **** **** *** ** *** **** **** ** ******* ******** ** *** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Annamma Thomas, a name, that changed our life at a moment when everywhere we got despair and lost hope. Right from the time we met her till the time we got pregnant  every second she lifted us up emotionally and mentally. Usually the doctors write medicines at  every meet during any treatment but she supported me both mentally and at physical level with good normal medications. With normal medications she told me that I will get pregnant at that time when my inner-self was totally in dilemma regarding my pregnancy. She was very polite and calm during our every meeting to her. She listened very carefully our every concern regarding pregnancy. We wish that every Gynecologist should learn from her that how to deal with the person who comes in hope of good treatment. Now we have two year old baby and its all because we got Dr Annamma Thomas as doctor. Best of luck to her...
This doctor is what put me back on track about life altogether! She identified all my ailments and is totally professional. She gives the right suggestions and treatment****** **** ** *** ******

Dr.Annamma is not only **** ******* *** professional but one of the most experienced doctor in St John's hospital. She is one of the most sought after doctor in the Gyne section ***** ** *** ********* ****** *** **********
Good practo keep doing what you're doing really was great help to me definitely for others also thanks a lot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Annamma patiently listened to my concern and explained the possible reasons for the health issue. She did not prescribe medication before completely understanding the exact situation. She recommended a blood test and a scan to ascertain the exact medical condition.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Annamma explained every stage of my pregnancy in a very simple manner and answered all my doubts. I developed an instant trust with her because of her friendly and simple nature.I truly feel blessed that I was guided to her by a friend of mine and am thankful to her for bringing my little bundle of joy to this world.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: While other doctors recommended starting medication, Dr. Annamma reassured that the condition does not need medication. She has asked to test again in a few months and based on the reports decide on the course of action. She explained the condition very well and answered all our queries patiently. Overall, we felt she was a down-to-earth and approachable doctor who made us feel comfortable.

review:

She is good at behavior, but I suggest to all to take a 2nd opinion. Also, he explanation on the disease is very very poor. 


Regards
Husband of a wife.
